ygData.messageBody:
It sure is handy not to have those bears and other animals agro on
you. I keep to not killing animals more for that than anything else.
Plus, hq bear pelts are not common drops. Hunt plenty of other stuff,
I suggest.

Barto of Rivervale, Druid 14.
